content: big diagonal domino by vicki monthei i used k2tog k1 ssk in the middle of the right side row instead of a double central decrease to get a bold diagonal line through the middle of the domino block i cast on 51 stitches but you can cast on any large odd number of stitches to begin there are 2 pattern row any combination of yarn and needles will work this simple block knits up fast skills needed cast on knit k2tog ssk purl p2tog and k3tog gauge is not important in this pattern any block-able yarn/thread will work make a swatch to check gauge and appearance 36 yards of lion brand 24/7 yarn will make a 51-stitch big diagonal domino block at gauge 4 5 stitches/inch and 8 5 row/inch in garter stitch blocked with lion brand 24/7 yarn and u s 8 5mm needles notes this pattern uses standard u s knitting abbreviations cast on 51 sts or any large odd number of sts leave a long tail for sewing later if needed k 1 row row 1 k to center 5 sts k2tog k1 ssk k to end row 2 k to center 3 sts p3 k to end repeat row 1 and 2 until there are 5 sts left next row p2tog p1 p2tog next row k3tog leave a long tail for sewing later if needed block to a square shape and sew blocks together if needed weave in ends use as desired happy knitting vicki monthei
